title: PLEASE NERF FIZZ
body: FIZZ the fat lesbian fish that wears armour with his aimbot ult it just ain't right so plz just whip out that nerf hammer and beat fizz up :D

replies.body: Currently the only issue I see with Fizz atm is his Ultimate hitbox, I'm not sure if its intended or not but its ridiculously huge to the point where you just need to throw it out long enough in front of you and your certain to hit your lane opponent, and unless they have {{item:3157}} they're basically dead at that point (Has happened enough to my friend who is a midlane main to the point where he just perma bans fizz)
